botan.cert.x509.x509cert

X.509 Certificates

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

class X509CertificateImpl: botan.cert.x509.x509_obj.X509Object;
This class represents X.509 Certificate

const PublicKey subjectPublicKey();
Get the public key associated with this certificate.

Returns:
subject public key of this certificate

const const(Vector!ubyte) subjectPublicKeyBits();
Get the public key associated with this certificate.

Returns:
subject public key of this certificate

const const(X509DN) issuerDn();
Get the issuer certificate DN.

Returns:
issuer DN of this certificate

const const(X509DN) subjectDn();
Get the subject certificate DN.

Returns:
subject DN of this certificate

const const(Vector!string) subjectInfo(in string what);
Get a value for a specific subject_info parameter name.

Params:
string what the name of the paramter to look up. Possible names are "X509.Certificate.version", "X509.Certificate.serial", "X509.Certificate.start", "X509.Certificate.end", "X509.Certificate.v2.key_id", "X509.Certificate.public_key", "X509v3.BasicConstraints.path_constraint", "X509v3.BasicConstraints.is_ca", "X509v3.ExtendedKeyUsage", "X509v3.CertificatePolicies", "X509v3.SubjectKeyIdentifier" or "X509.Certificate.serial".

Returns:
value(s) of the specified parameter

const const(Vector!string) issuerInfo(in string what);
Get a value for a specific subject_info parameter name.

Params:
string what the name of the paramter to look up. Possible names are "X509.Certificate.v2.key_id" or "X509v3.AuthorityKeyIdentifier".

Returns:
value(s) of the specified parameter

const const(Vector!ubyte) rawIssuerDn();
Raw subject DN

const const(Vector!ubyte) rawSubjectDn();
Raw issuer DN

const string startTime();
Get the notBefore of the certificate.

Returns:
notBefore of the certificate

const string endTime();
Get the notAfter of the certificate.

Returns:
notAfter of the certificate

const uint x509Version();
Get the X509 version of this certificate object.

Returns:
X509 version

const const(Vector!ubyte) serialNumber();
Get the serial number of this certificate.

Returns:
certificates serial number

const const(Vector!ubyte) authorityKeyId();
Get the DER encoded AuthorityKeyIdentifier of this certificate.

Returns:
DER encoded AuthorityKeyIdentifier

const const(Vector!ubyte) subjectKeyId();
Get the DER encoded SubjectKeyIdentifier of this certificate.

Returns:
DER encoded SubjectKeyIdentifier

const bool isSelfSigned();
Check whether this certificate is self signed.

Returns:
true if this certificate is self signed

const bool isCACert();
Check whether this certificate is a CA certificate.

Returns:
true if this certificate is a CA certificate

const bool allowedUsage(in string usage);
Returns true if and only if name (referring to an extended key constraint, eg "PKIX.ServerAuth") is included in the extended key extension.

const uint pathLimit();
Get the path limit as defined in the BasicConstraints extension of this certificate.

Returns:
path limit

const const(KeyConstraints) constraints();
Get the key constraints as defined in the KeyUsage extension of this certificate.

Returns:
key constraints

const const(Vector!string) exConstraints();
Get the key constraints as defined in the ExtendedKeyUsage extension of this certificate.

Returns:
key constraints

const const(Vector!string) policies();
Get the policies as defined in the CertificatePolicies extension of this certificate.

Returns:
certificate policies

const string ocspResponder();
Return the listed address of an OCSP responder, or empty if not set

const string crlDistributionPoint();
Return the CRL distribution point, or empty if not set

const string toString();
Returns:
a string describing the certificate

const string fingerprint(in string hash_name);
Return a fingerprint of the certificate

const bool matchesDnsName(in string name);
Check if a certain DNS name matches up with the information in the cert

const bool opEquals(in X509Certificate other);
Check to certificates for equality.

Returns:
true both certificates are (binary) equal

const bool opBinary(string op)(in X509Certificate other) if (op == "<");
Impose an arbitrary (but consistent) ordering

Returns:
true if this is less than other by some unspecified criteria

int opCmp(in X509Certificate cert2);
Check two certificates for ineah jsais sadfadfasfaquality

Returns:
true if the arguments represent different certificates, false if they are binary identical

this(DataSource input);
Create a certificate from a data source providing the DER or PEM encoded certificate.

Params:
DataSource input the data source

this(in string filename);
Create a certificate from a file containing the DER or PEM encoded certificate.

Params:
string filename the name of the certificate file
